short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove all the BS and read your article from any site peacefully

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin will help you read articles by removing all the annoying and useless things from the page and extracting just the article. You can also control the font style & theme (light or dark).

- Removes all trackers to maintain your privacy 💪
- Get rid of all kinds of annoying popups & banners ⚔️
- Change the theme to match your preference ⚫️
- Select the font style that suits your reading style 📖


Privacy focused! 🔒
- Get rid of the on page trackers that violates your privacy by tracking your reading habits

⭐️How-to-use
-> Install the extension
-> Pin it in the toolbar
-> Click the extension icon
-> Click on Remove BS button and start reading
-> Enjoy the read!
